name: structopt
readme:
# Structopt

This is the argument parser I use in my engine and various supporting tools.

# Zig Version

[`main`](https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/structopt/tree/main) loosely tracks Zig master. For support for specific Zig versions, see [releases](https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/structopt/releases/).

releases.name: v1.0.0
releases.body:
This release targets Zig v0.14.0. Thanks to those who contributed! :)

## What's Changed
* update to zig 0.14.0-dev.1495+f29bdd674 by @andrewrk in https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/structopt/pull/6
* fix type coercion failure by @andrewrk in https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/structopt/pull/8
* remove custom stringToEnum() by @travisstaloch in https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/structopt/pull/10

## New Contributors
* @andrewrk made their first contribution in https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/structopt/pull/6
* @travisstaloch made their first contribution in https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/structopt/pull/10

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/structopt/commits/v1.0.0
